title: So I'm being chased by MF and Skarner all the way through River from bot as Leona...
body:
Me: *Running, sees our Lee Sin mid, pings*

Lee: *Still chilling in mid*

Me: *Pings more*

Lee: *Still chilling in mid*

Me: *Frantically spams assistant pings, finally reaches the right side bush of Mid lane and dies*

Me: LEE
Lee:?
Me: You could have saved me if you had been paying the least bit of attention.
Lee: nah

Me: http://www.geekenstein.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/Hades-gif.gif

In all seriousness, nothing tilts me more than when teammates just completely disregard you when they could have easily saved you.

EDIT: To the people who need all the details I guess..

Basically the two champions were chasing me for a long time (Like I said, I made it all the way to the right side of Mid lane before I died)

I was low, so I was running, but me and my ADC actually stomped MF and her Blitz (but we got ganked by Skarner, and my ADC was already dead, he got killed by Skarner, but we killed Blitz)

Mf was the only one who was hitting me, I had gotten ahead of Skarner, and the only reason MF was keeping up was because of strut.

MF and Skarner were walking in a straight line

Lee only had to run down, Q MF, Kick her into Skarner (he still had ult) and we could have gone our merry way (Lee was full health)

Sorry for the {{summoner:3}} rant but Im apparently being misinterpreted badly and Im trying to clarify
Or when you ping for assistance at dragon and the enemy comes right at the end to kill you and steal it.

Yeah, as an ADC main I should make a vid of all the terrible help with dragon pings I get in the early game. 

1. Bot lane is pushed under tower -- jungle pings for help at dragon.
2. Bot lane is engaged in a fight they are winning - jungle pings for help at dragon, tries soloing and dies to enemy jungler - blames bot lane for their own lack of tact. 
3. Bot adc's are even in items and cs with the creep wave frozen center lane. Enemy jungle is unaccounted for. My jungle wants me to stop farming and go do drag. I politely turn down the offer to give up CS for a chance to potentiallyt lose drag and/or die while giving the opposing adc time to push out the wave under my tower and casually walk up to engage us during drag.

See those are all scenarios I avoid because I usually wait til lv 6 to dragon.

1. Being I am one of the few that watch the minimap I can see when bot lane is in trouble and will come up from river to trap them under tower.
2. Bot lane is winning I will wander thru the top of the bot lane jungle path to see if I can catch escapees before attempting dragon.
3. I'd rather see you push it back before attempting to help with dragon.

Also I never said anything about it just being bot lane. If the toplane brought TP and his lane is pushed enough he can come down to help defend. Same with mid and if the lanes end up turning against us I will make sure we get a tower and a kill or two to make up for the difference.

But ultimately Dragon can be soloed I just prefer to make sure everyone has map awareness in case the enemy comes around to say hi.

I assume if you were Leona, you were support. How did you end up by yourself? Did your ADC die, were you warding? Was bottom turret already destroyed?
If you had mana, you couldn't ult away? Flash over a wall? Did you have shoes? 

Was Lee mid or jungler? If it was early game, could leaving mid have put him behind in farm?

Was Skarner support or jungler? Where was enemy support/jungler, if Lee Sin came to help would you still have been outnumbered?

Everything in League is circumstantial, can't say one way or the other if he was right or wrong by not helping and the scenario you laid out is too vague.
You saying he could have saved you could mean you wanted him to use his ult simply to knock a full health Skarner away from you.

I'm not disagreeing with you, I didn't make any statements. Just theories and questions, because I'm guilty of being biased when I situation involves me and thinks you should consider all perspectives as I fail to do sometimes.
